Title: Freediving Beach House with Local Art & Yoga Space
description: Just 10 steps from the calm Assala Beach and close to both the lighthouse and town center, this house offers tranquility and nature. Decorated with handmade pieces by local artisans, it has 2 bedrooms with double beds, air conditioning, a living room for yoga or relaxing, office space with strong WiFi, a kitchen, and a bathroom. The freediving instructor owner can introduce you to the local freediving scene or help arrange trips and equipment rentals. Ideal for peaceful living or remote work. ✨ The house is situated just 10 steps from the renowned and tranquil Assala Beach, near the viewpoint on the mountain. This calm neighborhood is also close to the lighthouse and the town center, a location preferred by locals due to its proximity to all essential amenities. The house features unique, handmade decorations crafted by local artisans, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere in every corner. Key features of the house include: - 2 bedrooms, each with a double bed, air conditioning, and closets - A spacious living room with air conditioning, perfect for yoga, stretching, or relaxing on the couch - A dedicated office space with strong WiFi - A separate kitchen equipped with a hot and cold water dispenser - 1 bathroom - Additional space outside the rooms, ideal for stretching or relaxing - A dining area with a wooden table for meals The owner is a freediving instructor who can introduce you to Dahab’s vibrant freediving scene, arrange trips to the Blue Hole, or help you rent freediving equipment.
amenities: Clothing storage: walk-in closet and closet
Space where guests can cook their own meals
Housekeeping available 8 hours a day, every day - available at extra cost
